text: Avatara Purusha (ಅವತಾರ ಪುರುಷ) is 1991 Kannada action thriller film, which stars Ambarish and Sumalatha in the leading roles. ==Cast== *Ambarish *Sumalatha *Jai Jagadish *C. R. Simha *Sudheer *Devaraj *Balakrishna *Dinesh *Lakshman *Thimmayya *Saikumar *Lohithashwa *Vasudeva Rao *Parvathavani *Pandaribai *Tara *Jyothi *Disco Shanthi *Mysore Lokesh *Shashikiran *Shani Mahadevappa *Srishailan *Bharathish *Vijay *Shanthamma *Shyamala *Anitharani *Sujatha *Shobharani *Uma == Soundtrack == == Release == == References == ==References== Category:Indian films Category:1991 action thriller films Category:Indian action thriller films Category:1991 films Category:1990s Kannada-language films
title: Avatara Purusha
